ygData.subject: Re: A start as a fletcher
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, any combination is fine for making arrows. I use to take the four least expensive ones that are not trivila for me. I sell te arrows. If I want to
ygData.messageBody:
> Although I'm wondering if any combination is a valid one or if only some will work. I guess it's the later so first, what is needed for class B arrows? (or the arrows or bow you're currently making).

> Thormael



Yes, any combination is fine for making arrows.
I use to take the four least expensive ones that
are not trivila for me.

I sell te arrows.

If I want to make arrows for myself,
I also take the four least expensive items that
are not trivial for me but change knock and/or
fletch to suit my needs. (range)

I initially spent 19 skill points.
Now I'm at 69.

Corydon
May the shadows of the forest protect your soul.
